region.name: Highlands
region.climate: Cold mountain air, fresh, rarely humid
region.location: Mid-north.Mountain range stretches far east, completely blockages access to Strunval

notable_people.name: Priest Kunst
notable_people.role: Greet travelers and lead them towards rooms to stay in

notable_people.name: High Priest Mornil
notable_people.role: Run High Point Monastery, administer punihsment, ensure that rules are adhered to, even by travelers.

items.name: Cane of Blind Seeing
items.effect: Allows user to see while under the effects of blindness if wielded in both hands. Mildly improves sight in the dark

region.name: Strunval
region.climate: Cold temperature, snows often, harsh conditions
region.location: North of the Highlands. Furthest known region on the continent

notable_people.name: Ruins Scavenger
notable_people.role: Digs up hidden treasures of a once great civilization that now remains frozen in the snow

items.name: Frostbitten Spade
items.effect: A bit more durable than the common shovel

items.name: Ruined Amulet
items.effect: Does nothing. Perhaps someone who knows the history of the land can help decipher what it was once for

notable_people.name: Asthal, King of the Northpeople
notable_people.role: Rules over the few settlements of the North. Known as the strongest in the land, and rules by might and conquest

items.name: Weathered Sword
items.effect: A basic, weathered sword. Not actually the one that Asthal uses in battle. +3 str

items.name: Crown of the Frozen Behemoth
items.effect: A crown fashioned from the horns and maw of a great frozen monstronsity that lies in the depths of the Fjord. Effects unknown

region.name: Mojin Kingdom
region.climate: Dry, hot air. Harsh seasons and hardened warriors mark the reputation of the land
region.locaiton: East border towards the south of the highlands. The great Broken Landsea rune perpendicular to the mountain range, isolating the kingdom from others

notable_people.name: Herald of the Sky
notable_people.role: Adjutant to the Queen. The public eye knows of her existence and power, but little of her herself

items.name: Emerald Robe
items.effect: An opulent emerald green robe. Silky to the touch, only the finests for the Queen's most trusted assistant. +3 charisma, +3 intelligence

items.name: Orb of the Sky Mother
items.effect: Grants the user sight of everything in a 2 mile radius. Can 'zoom in' on certain parts.

notable_people.name: Troupe Leader Anothos
notable_people.role: Leaders the famous Travelling Troupe, a nomadic group of entertainers who bring an entire cities worth of entertainment wherever they go

items.name: Mask of the Performer
items.effect: +8 charisma. Allows the wearer a near perfect impression of any person they have met extensively before

items.name: Multi-Tool Cane
items.effect: A cane with multiple purposes. Has a concealed blade, can be used to set up stages, and also looks cool. A handy tool to have around
